official_title: Zinc Effect on Inflammation and Cardiovascular Risk in HIV
inclusion_criteria:
* HIV-1 infection
* Documentation of an HIV-1 RNA level of ≤400 copies/mL in the last 4 months prior to study entry
* Male or Female age ≥18 years
* Zinc level ≤0.75 mg/L in the last 60 days
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnancy/lactation
* Known cardiovascular disease
* Uncontrolled diabetes
